titleStmt.title: The effect of certaine branches of the statute made in anno 33. Henrici viij. touching the maintenance of artillery, and the punishment of such as vse vnlawfull games, very necessary to be put in execution.
Laws, etc. (Public general acts). Abridgments
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: An abridgment of Public General Act 33 Hen.VIII.c.9, reissued periodically in an attempt at enforcement.
Arms 23, with 1 leaf below the lion's leg; Steele notation: and house hundred. 55 lines.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
